title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Skills, Careers and Employment
purpose: The APPG is devoted to raising the profile and status of skills, careers and employment policy in the UK. It brings together Parliament, employers, and the skills sector to develop effective skills policy as a central means of personal and economic development for the 21st Century.

contact_details.secretariat: Policy Connect acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.policyconnect.org.uk/

detailed_benefits.Description: Policy Connect is funded by the following to act as the group's secretariat: ACCA, Career Development institute, Chartered Management Institute, East Kent Colleges Group, Federation of Awarding Bodies, High Value Manufacturing Catapult, Institute of the Motor Industry, Midkent College, Nexperia, NOCN, North Kent College, South Thames College, University of Derby, Warwick Manufacturing Group, Youth Futures Foundation From: 31/10/2024 To: 30/10/2025
